thread.title: Night games a weekly affair for Stanford
thread.title_full: Night games a weekly affair for Stanford - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tom FitzGerald
title: Night games a weekly affair for Stanford
text:
Photo: Tony Avelar, Associated Press Stanford head coach David Shaw stands with his team under the cover of night last Thursday. Stanford head coach David Shaw stands with his team under the cover...
Stanford football games have a little bit of everything this year, it seems. Long touchdown plays, amazing catches, ferocious blocking and, of course, endless replay reviews. There’s one thing you aren’t like to see: the sun. Stanford head coach David Shaw stands with his team under the cover of night last Thursday.
